categories: Category:Sith Lords of the reconstituted Sith Empire

nodes.text: Feng was a human female Sith Lord from the Sith Empire who served on Corellia during the Third Galactic War. Feng was slain alongside Darth Yun on Corellia during the battle there.

In combat, Feng wielded a double-bladed red lightsaber and was proficient in her use of the Force during combat. Her abilities in combat extended to using lightning and its variation Lightning Storm. Feng could also use Death Field against her opponents and could also use affliction against them in order to weaken them.
